body_html:
I think up until this point we've been using our custom SwitchBox component (which uses an Ant Switch under the hood). I think we'll end up having to do something similar for Checkboxes.

I don't imagine it'd be a huge thing to implement, most of the SwitchBox code would already apply. Alternatively, if you're interested in landing this sooner than later, you could simply swap the Checkbox here with a SwitchBox and we can change the components later once the checkbox stuff is written.
